dashboard.totalIncomeDesc: Jimillar kudaden shiga gami da tallace-tallace da sauran hanyoyi
dashboard.netIncomeDesc: Kudaden shiga ban da kashe kuɗi
dashboard.createFirstStoreDesc: Ƙirƙiri shagon ku na farko don fara sarrafa kasuwancin ku da bin diddigin tallace-tallace, kayan ajiya, da kuɗi.

inventory.title: Kaya / Jerin Kayayyaki
inventory.subtitle: Kula da kayan ku
inventory.noProductsDesc: Gwada daidaita zaɓen neman ku don nemo abin da kuke nema.
inventory.noProductsGetStarted: Fara ta ƙara kayan ku na farko zuwa jerin kaya.
inventory.enterPurchasedPrice: Shigar da farashin saye (ba dole ba)
inventory.enterUnitPrice: Shigar da farashin ɗaya (ba dole ba)
inventory.addToFavourite: Ƙara zuwa abubuwan da ake so
inventory.addToFavourites: Ƙara zuwa Abubuwan da Ake So
inventory.markAsFavourite: Yi alama a matsayin abin da ake so don samun sauƙin shiga
inventory.removeFromFavourite: Cire Daga Abubuwan da Ake So
inventory.setAsFavourite: Saita A Matsayin Abin da Ake So
inventory.currentStock: Kayan Da Ake Da Shi Yanzu
inventory.enterQuantityToAdd: Shigar da adadin da za a ƙara
inventory.alertTriggeredBelow: Za a kunna faɗakarwa lokacin da kayan ya ƙi ƙasa da wannan adadi
inventory.inventoryManagementDesc: Ƙirƙiri shagon ku na farko don fara gudanar da kayan ku, bin matakan kaya, da lura da aikin tallace-tallace.

sales.title: Tallace-tallace
sales.subtitle: Bi da kula da tallace-tallacen ku
sales.noSalesDesc: Fara rubuta tallace-tallace don bin aikin kasuwancin ku
sales.adjustFilters: Gwada daidaita zaɓen ku ko ƙara tallace-tallacen ku na farko don farawa.
sales.salesManagementDesc: Ƙirƙiri shagon ku na farko don fara rubuta tallace-tallace, bin kudaden shiga, da gudanar da ma'amalolin kasuwancin ku.

savings.title: Ajiyar Kuɗi
savings.subtitle: Bi manufofin ajiyar kuɗin ku
savings.noPlansYet: Har yanzu babu shirye-shiryen ajiyar kuɗi

savings.manageSavingsPlans: Sarrafa shirye-shiryen ajiyar kuɗin ku kuma bi gudummawar ku

settings.title: Saitunan
settings.subtitle: Kula da asusun ku da saitunan shago
settings.noStoreMessage: Har yanzu ba ku da shago. Ƙirƙiri shagon ku na farko don farawa.
settings.storeNameUpdated: An sabunta sunan shago cikin nasara
settings.storeLocationUpdated: An sabunta wurin shago cikin nasara
settings.storeMarketUpdated: An sabunta kasuwar shago cikin nasara
settings.hideBalanceDesc: Lokacin da aka kunna, za a ɓoye bayanan kuɗi daga dashboard
settings.languageDescription: Zaɓi yaren da kuke so don taken kananan rubutu da taken sassa
settings.mobileAppInstallation: Shigar da Manhaja ta Wayar Hannu
settings.installDescription: Samu mafi kyawun gogewa da manhaja ta wayar hannu - tana aiki ba tare da intanet ba, saurin lodawa, da sanarwar turawa!
settings.worksOffline: Tana aiki ba tare da intanet ba
settings.manualInstallDesc: Yi amfani da zaɓin 'Ƙara zuwa Allo na Gida' na burauzar ku don shigar da manhaja
settings.installationStartedDesc: Bi umarnin burauzar ku don kammala shigarwa.
settings.installationFailedDesc: Don Allah sake gwadawa ko amfani da zaɓin 'Ƙara zuwa Allo na Gida' na burauzar ku.
settings.installToastDesc: Samu mafi kyawun gogewa da manhaja ta wayar hannu - tana aiki ba tare da intanet ba, saurin lodawa, da sanarwar turawa!
settings.installDismissedDesc: Kuna iya shigar da manhaja daga baya daga Saitunan.
settings.appAlreadyInstalled: An Riga An Shigar da Manhaja
settings.appInstalledDesc: Kuna amfani da manhaja ta wayar hannu ta SheBalance. Ji daɗin ingantaccen gogewa!
settings.enablePushNotificationsDesc: Karɓi sanarwar tallace-tallace, faɗakarwar ƙarancin kaya, da mahimman sabuntawa
settings.notificationPermissionDenied: An ƙi izinin sanarwa. Don Allah kunna sanarwa a cikin saitunan binciken ku.

help.title: Cibiyar Taimako
help.subtitle: Samu taimako da tallafi
help.description: Nemo amsoshin tambayoyinku ku koyi yadda ake amfani da SheBalance da kyau
help.userManualDescription: Cikakken jagora don amfani da fasalulluka da aikin SheBalance
help.audioLearningDescription: Saurara ku koyi rubuta littattafai a cikin yaren da kuke so
help.comingSoon: Yana Zuwa Ba Da Daɗewa Ba
help.learnInYourLanguage: Koyi Rubuta Littattafai a Cikin Yaren Ku
help.audioTutorialsDescription: An tsara koyarwar mu ta sauti don taimaka muku fahimtar ra'ayoyin rubuta littattafai a cikin yaren da kuke so. Kowace koyarwa tana rufe mahimman batutuwa kamar rubuta ma'amaloli, kula da asusai, da kiyaye ingantattun bayanan kuɗi.
help.pdfDocumentTitle: Rubuta Littattafai Don Ku - Takardun PDF

pdfContent.separateMoney: Yadda ake Raba Kuɗin Kasuwanci da na Sirri
pdfContent.contributionStrategy: Gudummawa A Matsayin Dabara don Tara Kuɗi
pdfContent.loansDebt: Samun Ƙananan Rancen Kuɗi da Kula da Bashi da Hikima
pdfContent.growingBusiness: Haɓaka Kasuwancin Ku da Kyakkyawan Rubuta Littattafai

help.moreTopics: Da sauran batutuwa masu amfani da yawa...
help.noHelpArticlesFound: Ba a sami labaran taimako ba
help.adjustSearchFilters: Gwada daidaita binciken ku ko zaɓe

audioTutorials.englishDescription: Koyi asalin rubuta littattafai, haɗe da rubuta ma'amaloli, kula da asusai, da kiyaye bayanan kuɗi.
audioTutorials.yorubaDescription: Kọ́ àwọn ìpilẹ̀ ìṣirò owó, títẹ̀ àwọn ìṣòwò, àti ìṣàkóso àwọn àkọsílẹ̀ owó.
audioTutorials.pidginTitle: Yadda Ake Rubuta Littattafai don Masu Farawa
audioTutorials.pidginDescription: Koyi yadda ake rubuta al'amuran kuɗin ku, ajiye bayanan kasuwancin ku, da kula da asusunku da kyau.
audioTutorials.hausaDescription: Koyi tushen rubutun kudade, da yadda ake rubuta kasuwanci, da kula da bayanan kudi.
audioTutorials.igboDescription: Koyi yadda ake rubuta kuɗi, rubuta ma'amaloli, da kula da dukkan bayanan kuɗi.

introduction.title: Gabatarwa
introduction.subtitle: Barka da Zuwa SheBalance
introduction.description: SheBalance wata manhaja ce ta sarrafa kuɗi da aka tsara don taimaka wa mutane da kasuwanci su bi tallace-tallace, kula da kashe kuɗi, lura da kaya, ajiye kuɗi, da kiyaye ingantattun bayanan kuɗi. Wannan littafi yana ba da jagora mai sauƙi mataki-mataki kan yadda ake amfani da manhaja yadda ya kamata.
introduction.step1: Bi tallace-tallace da kudaden shiga da sauƙi
introduction.step4: Ƙirƙiri shirye-shiryen ajiyar kuɗi da lura da ci gaba
introduction.step5: Kiyaye bayanan kuɗi masu tsabta a wuri ɗaya

gettingStarted.title: Ƙirƙiri Asusu & Shiga
gettingStarted.subtitle: Ƙirƙirar Asusu & Shiga
gettingStarted.description: Ƙirƙiri asusun ku na SheBalance ku shiga don samun damar dashboard ɗinku.
gettingStarted.step1: Don saukar da manhaja ta SheBalance akan Android, ziyarci www.shebalance.org ku danna faɗakarwar shigarwa lokacin da ta bayyana
gettingStarted.step2: Don saukar da manhaja ta SheBalance akan iOS, ziyarci www.shebalance.org a safari, danna maɓallin rabawa, sannan danna maɓallin 'Ƙara zuwa Allo na Gida'
gettingStarted.step4: Cika bayanan ku kamar suna, lambar waya, da kalmar sirri.
gettingStarted.step5: Tabbatar da asusun ku (kuna iya karɓar lamba ta imel).
gettingStarted.step6: Don Shiga, Shigar da lambar waya/imel ɗinku da kalmar sirri don shiga.
gettingStarted.step7: Bayan shiga, za a kai ku zuwa Dashboard.

dashboard.title: Bayanan Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Fahimtar Dashboard
dashboard.description: Dashboard ɗinku yana ba ku cikakken bayanin ayyukan kuɗin ku.
dashboard.step1: Jimillar Kudaden Shiga: Adadin da aka samu daga tallace-tallace
dashboard.step2: Jimillar Tallace-tallace: Adadin ma'amalolin tallace-tallace da aka kammala
dashboard.step3: Jimillar Ajiyar Kuɗi: Adadin da aka ajiye a shirye-shiryen ajiyar kuɗi
dashboard.step4: Faɗakarwar Kayan da ya Ragu: Kayayyaki da suka yi raguwa
dashboard.step5: Jimillar Kudaden Shiga: Dukkan kudaden shiga da aka rubuta
dashboard.step6: Jimillar Kashe Kuɗi: Dukkan kashe kuɗin da aka rubuta

inventory.title: Gudanar da Kaya
inventory.description1: Kula da kayayyaki da matakan kaya yadda ya kamata.
inventory.step1_1: Jimillar Kayayyaki: Adadin kayayyakin da ake da su
inventory.step1_2: Darajar Kaya: Jimillar darajar dukkan kayayyaki a hannun jari
inventory.step1_3: Kayan da ya Fi Sayarwa: Kayan da aka fi sayarwa
inventory.step1_4: Faɗakarwar Kayan da ya Ragu: Faɗakarwa lokacin da kayan ya ƙasa da iyakarsa
inventory.description2: Ƙara kayayyaki zuwa hannun jarin ku da sauri.
inventory.step2_2: Shigar da sunan kaya, farashin sayan, farashin ɗaya, da yawa

productDetails.title: Bayanan Kaya
productDetails.subtitle: Kula da Kaya
productDetails.description: Duba bayanan kaya ku yi ayyuka da sauri.
productDetails.step1: Duba sunan kaya, farashin ɗaya, yawa, da matsayin hannun jari
productDetails.step2: Gyara, Ƙara Kaya, Share, ko Ƙara zuwa Zaɓaɓɓu
productDetails.step3: Lura da samuwa da sabunta hannun jari cikin sauƙi

sales.title: Gudanar da Tallace-tallace
sales.description1: Bi aikin tallace-tallacen ku da riba.
sales.step1_1: Jimillar Tallace-tallace: Jimillar kudaden shiga da aka samu
sales.step1_2: Ma'amaloli: Adadin tallace-tallacen da aka kammala
sales.step1_3: Jimillar Riba: Dangane da farashin sayan da farashin sayarwa
sales.step2_4: Zaɓi hanyar biya: Kuɗi, Canja Wuri, ko Bashi
sales.description3: Kowane tallace-tallace yana ƙunshe da mahimman bayanai don tunani.

finance.title: Gudanar da Kuɗi
finance.description1: Bi dukkan kuɗi da ke shiga da fita don kasuwancin ku.
finance.step1_1: Jimillar Kudaden Shiga: Dukkan kuɗin da aka karɓa
finance.step1_2: Jimillar Kashe Kuɗi: Dukkan kuɗin da aka kashe
finance.step1_3: Kudaden Shiga Na Asali: Kudaden shiga ban da kashe kuɗi
finance.description2: Ƙirƙiri rikodin kudaden shiga ko kashe kuɗi.
finance.step2_2: Zaɓi nau'i: Kudaden Shiga ko Kashe Kuɗi
finance.step2_3: Shigar da adadi, bayani, da kwanan wata
finance.step2_5: Zaɓa bayanai ta nau'i ko kwanan wata kamar yadda ake buƙata

savings.title: Gudanar da Ajiyar Kuɗi
savings.description1: Saita da bi ajiyar kuɗi zuwa ga manufofin ku.
savings.step1_2: Shigar da Suna, Kwanan Wata na Farawa/Ƙarewa, Manufa
savings.step1_3: Zaɓi Lokaci (Kowace Rana/Mako/Wata) da Adadin Manufa
savings.description2: Bi ci gaba, ƙara gudummawa, cire, ko share shiri.
savings.step2_1: Yi gudummawa ku bi ci gaba
savings.step2_2: Cire kuɗi lokacin da ake buƙata
savings.step2_3: Zaɓa shirye-shirye: Sabon Farawa, Yana Ci Gaba, An Kammala, An Cire

settings.title: Saitunan
settings.subtitle: Kula da Shagon Ku & Keɓantawa
settings.description: Sabunta bayanan shago, keɓantawa, da kula da asusu.
settings.step1: Bayanan Shago: Gyara sunan shago, wuri, da kasuwa
settings.step2: Saitunan Keɓantawa: Zaɓi don sanya bayanan shago su bayyana ko a ɓoye
settings.step3: Yankin Haɗari: Share shago ko share asusu har abada (ba za a iya sokewa ba)

conclusion.title: Ƙarshe
conclusion.subtitle: Kun shirya don tafiya!
conclusion.description: SheBalance yana sauƙaƙa sarrafa tallace-tallacen ku, kashe kuɗi, ajiyar kuɗi, da kaya a wuri ɗaya. Yi amfani da wannan littafi a matsayin jagora don farawa da haɓaka manhaja don ingantaccen sarrafa kuɗi.
conclusion.step2: Yi amfani da dashboard don yanke shawara mai hankali
conclusion.step3: Yi amfani da shirye-shiryen ajiyar kuɗi don cim ma manufofin ku

profile.title: Bayanan Mai Amfani
profile.subtitle: Kula da bayanan bayanin ku
profile.name: Suna
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Ba za a iya soke wannan aikin ba
